QuestData.Title: A Choice to Make
QuestData.Description: We're just about ready to go here. All that's needed now is for you to make your choice.$B$BTake a look at the blueprints on the drafting table.$B$BAre we going to construct a corral or a tankworks?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Drafting Table to choose between the construction of a Corral or a Tankworks.
QuestData.CompletionText: We just need your decision, $n. Are we making a corral or a tankworks?
QuestData.RewardText: This is a momentous occasion, commander. I'll have Thaelin and his people get to work right away.$B$BYou'll see; this decision is going to be critical in our efforts against the Warsong.
